section.title: Exporting Projects
section.para: You can choose to export the currently opened Project () or all of the Projects in the database (). Projects are exported in .xml format so that they can be added to e.g. version control systems.
Projects are exported along with all their test result summaries.

listitem.para: To export a single Project from the database, the Project you want to export must be open.
Choose the location to save your Project, and the name you want to save it under.
The Project (including the test result summaries ()) will first be refreshed and then exported. It is saved as an .xml file.
When you export a single Project, only the currently opened version is exported.

section.title: Exporting all of the Projects from the database

listitem.para: Choose or create a folder where you want the Projects to be stored.
The Projects (including the test result summaries ()) will be saved as .xml files.
When you export all Projects, all versions of each Project are exported.
